title: Guardiana - Freshathon
description: A web application that uses image recognition to detect plant diseases from user-uploaded photos. It offers personalized solutions, product purchasing options, and preventive measures for maintaining plant health.

title: Voting Management System – Mini Project
description: A project that uses ML to predict Korean drama ratings by analyzing features such as genre, content rating, release year, and other relevant factors to provide accurate predictions.

title: K-Drama Rating Analysis
description: A project that uses machine learning to predict Korean drama ratings by analyzing features such as genre, content rating, release year, and other relevant factors to provide accurate predictions.

title: Online Learning Platform – JDBC Project
description: A platform that allows users to register, join courses, attend quizzes, view scores, and shows a leaderboard of top scorers, built using JDBC.
